skills.name: Invoker's Spear
skills.des: Deals 2 Physical DMG. Costs 1 Electro Dice and 2 Unaligned Dices.

skills.name: Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer
skills.des: Deals 3 Electro DMG. Costs 3 Electro Dices.

skills.name: Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness
skills.des: Deals 4 Electro DMG. Pactsworn Pathclearer's Indwelling Level +2. Costs 4 Electro Dices and 2 Energy.

skills.name: Lawful Enforcer
skills.des: When the battle begins, this character gains Pactsworn Pathclearer.

skills.name: Surge
skills.des: Deals 1 Hydro DMG. Costs 1 Hydro Dice and 2 Unaligned Dices.

skills.name: Oceanid Mimic Summoning
skills.des: Randomly summons 1 Oceanid Mimic. Prioritizes summoning a different type from pre

skills.name: The Myriad Wilds
skills.des: Randomly summons 2 Oceanid Mimics. Prioritizes summoning a different type from pre

skills.name: Tide and Torrent
skills.des: Deals 2 Hydro DMG. For each friendly summon on the field, deals + 2 additional DMG. Costs 3 Hydro Dices and 3 Energy.

skills.name: Water Ball
skills.des: Deals 1 Hydro DMG. Costs 1 Hydro Dice and 2 Unaligned Dices.

skills.name: Influx Blast
skills.des: Deals 3 Hydro DMG. The target character receives Refraction. Costs 3 Hydro Dices.

skills.name: Rippled Reflection
skills.des: Deals 5 Hydro DMG. Costs 3 Hydro Dices and 2 Energy.

skills.name: Thrust
skills.des: Deals 2 Physical DMG. Costs 1 Pyro Dice and 2 Unaligned Dices.

skills.name: Prowl
skills.des: Deals 1 Pyro DMG. This character gains Stealth. Costs 3 Pyro Dices.

skills.name: Blade Ablaze
skills.des: Deals 5 Pyro DMG. Costs 3 Pyro Dices and 2 Energy.

skills.name: Stealth Master
skills.des: When the battle begins, this character gains Stealth.

skills.name: Ichimonji
skills.des: Deals 2 Physical DMG. Costs 1 Anemo Dice and 2 Unaligned Dices.

skills.name: Blustering Blade
skills.des: Deals 1 Anemo DMG, summons 1 Shadowsword: Lone Gale. Costs 3 Anemo Dices.

skills.name: Frosty Assault
skills.des: Deals 1 Cryo DMG, summons 1 Shadwosword: Galloping Frost.

skills.name: Pseudo Tengu Sweeper
skills.des: Deals 4 Anemo DMG, triggers the effect(s) of all your Shadowsword Summon(s). Does not consume their usages. Costs 3 Anemo Dices and 3 Energy.

skills.name: Plasma Lawa
skills.des: Deals 2 Physical DMG. Costs 1 Geo Dice and 2 Unaligned Dices.

skills.name: Movo Lawa
skills.des: Deals 3 Physical DMG. Costs 3 Geo Dices.

skills.name: Upa Shato
skills.des: Deals 5 Physical DMG. Costs 3 Geo Dices and 2 Energy.

skills.name: Infused Stonehide
skills.des: When the battle begins, this character gains Stonehide and Stone Force.

skills.name: Majestic Dance
skills.des: Deals 2 Physical DMG. Costs 1 Dendro Dice and 2 Unaligned Dices.

skills.name: Volatile Spore Cloud
skills.des: Deals 3 Dendro DMG. Costs 3 Dendro Dices.

skills.name: Feather Spreading
skills.des: Deals 4 Dendro DMG, then consumes all Radical Vitality stacks. For each stack consumed, this instance deals + 1 DMG. Costs 3 Dendro Dices and 2 Energy.

skills.name: Radical Vitality
skills.des: When the battle begins, this character gains Radical Vitality.
